definition: horse/CL:匹[pi3]/horse or cavalry piece in Chinese chess/knight in Western chess
surname Ma/abbr. for Malaysia 馬來西亞|马来西亚[Ma3 lai2 xi1 ya4]
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
a careless person/scatterbrain/frivolous and forgetful/abbr. for 馬馬虎虎、大大咧咧、嘻嘻哈哈|马马虎虎、大大咧咧、嘻嘻哈哈

lit. even a scrawny camel is bigger than a horse (idiom)/fig. even after suffering a loss, a rich person is still better off than ordinary people/a cultured person may come down in the world, but he is still superior to the common people
pinyin: shou4 si3 de5 luo4 tuo5 bi3 ma3 da4
Fei4 er3 ma3 da4 ding4 li3

definition: Tsing Ma Bridge (to Hong Kong Airport)

sentences.english: The paper will review historically the difficult course of the proof of Fermat's Great Theorem.
sentences.chinese: 文中就费马大定理证明的艰难历程作一历史性的评述。

sentences.english: Then said Martha unto Jesus, Lord, if thou hadst been here, my brother had not died.
sentences.chinese: 马大对耶稣说，主阿，你若早在这里，我兄弟必不死。

sentences.english: Mary, of Lazarus , Martha, and Mary, somehow knew Jesus her friend was going to die.
sentences.chinese: 拉撒路和马大的姐妹马利亚知道她的朋友耶稣要受死。

sentences.english: 30Now Jesus had not yet entered the village, but was still at the place where Martha had met him.
sentences.chinese: 那时，耶稣还没有进村子，仍在马大迎接他的地方。

sentences.english: A starved camel is bigger than a horse.
In the New Testament, the sister of Lazarus and Mary and a friend of Jesus.
sentences.chinese: 马大新约圣经中，拉撒路和玛丽之姊，耶稣之友。

sentences.english: Remember Jesus' friends, Mary and Martha?
sentences.chinese: 还记得耶稣的朋友，马利亚和马大吗？

sentences.english: Instead of supporting her, Jesus commends Mary. Why?
sentences.chinese: 耶稣却没有支持马大，反而称赞马利亚。为什么呢？

sentences.english: Now Jesus was not yet come into the town, but was in that place where Martha met him.
sentences.chinese: 那时，耶稣还没有进村子，仍在马大迎接他的地方。

definition: horse/CL:匹[pi3]/horse or cavalry piece in Chinese chess/knight in Western chess
surname Ma/abbr. for Malaysia 馬來西亞|马来西亚[Ma3 lai2 xi1 ya4]
